title: Did researchers warn of some COVID-19 vaccines that could increase the risk of HIV infection?
subtitle: Researchers warned that a certain form of COVID-19 vaccine could increase the risk of HIV infection in some vulnerable populations.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Researchers in the Lancet newspaper warned that a CDVID-19 vaccine under development (approved for limited use in China) could increase the risk of HIV infection.
